item.title: GRE AWA MODEL ESSAYS
item.description: Issue 1 “We can usually learn much more from people whose views we share than from people whose views contradict our own.”; disagreement can cause stress and inhibit learning.” Essay   Do we learn more from people whose ideas we share in common than from those whose ideas contradict ours? The speaker deems so, for the reason that disagreement can cause stress and inhibit learning. I concede that undue discord can impede learning.
